data.title: Rock and Roll Terrorist: The Graphic Life of Shock Rocker Gg Allin (Comix Journalism)
data.meta_description: Rock and Roll Terrorist: The Graphic Life of Shock Rocker Gg Allin (Comix Journalism) by Chancellor, Reid - ISBN 10: 1621064654 - ISBN 13: 9781621064657 - Microcosm Publishing - 2020 - Softcover
data.text:
Rock and Roll Terrorist : The Graphic Story of GG Allin

Reid Chancellor

Published by Microcosm Publishing Okt 2020, 2020

ISBN 10: 1621064654 / ISBN 13: 9781621064657

New / Taschenbuch

Quantity: 3 available

Taschenbuch. Condition: Neu. Neuware - Born as Jesus Christ Allin and raised in rural isolation by a violently abusive religious fanatic, GG Allin grew up to be one of punk's most controversial figures. His music was overshadowed by his on-stage antics, including throwing blood and feces at the audience and hurting himself and audience members. In this first substantial biography of the man who wanted to make rock 'dangerous' again, Hardcore Anxiety author and illustrator Reid Chancellor portrays Allin's life and early death with sensitivity, asking us to look beyond the shocking spectacle to understand the troubled human behind the scenes, and the societal forces that pushed him to the edge of creative expression. Seller Inventory # 9781621064657

Contact seller
